tweet_text: @Rob_In_WI Against Wake Forest and then Virginia Tech, we absolutely could not run the ball, because yeah, IMO the ideal play it to run run run and get 4-5 yards every carry, setting up tons of short 3rd and 4th downs, but if you can't run the ball, now it's 3rd and 4th down at 8+ yards.
text_en: Against Wake Forest and then Virginia Tech, we absolutely could not run the ball, because yeah, IMO the ideal play it to run run run and get -5 yards every carry, setting up tons of short rd and th downs, but if you can't run the ball, now it's rd and th down at + yards.
